import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './home.scss'; import githubLogo from '../media/githublogo.png'; import linkedinLogo from '../media/linkedin.png'; import Projects from './Projects'; import Helmet from 'react-helmet'; import reactLogo from '../media/reactlogo.png'; import javaLogo from '../media/javalogo.png'; import pythonLogo from '../media/pythonlogo.png'; import htmlLogo from '../media/htmllogo.png'; import phpLogo from '../media/phplogo.png'; import sqlLogo from '../media/sqllogo.png'; import cssLogo from '../media/csslogo.png'; import rLogo from '../media/rlogo.png'; import javascriptLogo from '../media/javascriptlogo.png'; import linuxLogo from '../media/Tux.svg'; import AnimatedBackground from '../components/AnimatedBackground'; const languages = [ { name: 'React', image: reactLogo }, { name: 'Java', image: javaLogo }, { name: 'Python', image: pythonLogo }, { name: 'HTML', image: htmlLogo }, { name: 'PHP', image: phpLogo }, { name: 'SQL', image: sqlLogo }, { name: 'CSS', image: cssLogo }, { name: 'R', image: rLogo }, { name: 'JavaScript', image: javascriptLogo }, { name: 'Linux', image: linuxLogo }, ]; function Home() { const [repos, setRepos] = useState([]); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [experienceOpen, setExperienceOpen] = useState(false); const [certificationsOpen, setCertificationsOpen] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const fetchRepos = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('https://api.github.com/users/andrew8003/repos'); const sortedRepos = response.data.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.updated_at) - new Date(a.updated_at)); setRepos(sortedRepos); } catch { setError('Unable to load repositories at this time.'); } }; fetchRepos(); }, []); const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen(!menuOpen); return (
Andrew Hanna | Software Engineer

ANDREW HANNA

MEng Software Engineering

About Experience Certifications Projects Skills Links Contact

Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.

- Chris Pine

GitHub LinkedIn

About Me

Hi, I'm Andrew, a recently graduated Software Engineer with a passion for learning cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems and create innovative projects.

I am always open and eager to learn new skills and technologies to enhance my expertise and contribute effectively to any team or project.

Experience

setExperienceOpen(!experienceOpen)}>

UCL, Linux Support Analyst

June 2025 - Current

▼
{experienceOpen && (
  • Linux system proficiency across multiple distributions
  • System upgrades, maintenance, and security hardening across Linux environments
  • User support via ticketing systems and direct interaction
  • Legacy PHP website upgrades and maintenance
  • Containerization and virtualization technologies
  • Full system lifecycle management: specification definition, procurement, assembly, rack installation, configuration, and deployment
  • System administration and infrastructure management
  • On-premise to cloud migration planning and execution
  • Monitoring system implementation and management
  • Securing solutions to unique and dynamic challenges
)}

Certifications & Training

setCertificationsOpen(!certificationsOpen)}>

Red Hat System Administration (RHSA)

Current

▼
{certificationsOpen && (
  • ✓ Red Hat System Administration I (RH124) - Ver. 10.0 Verify
  • ○ Red Hat System Administration II (RH134) Planned
  • ○ RHSA Certification Exam Planned
)}

Projects

{error ? (

{error}

) : ( )}

Technical Skills

{languages.map((lang) => (
{lang.name}
))}

Get In Touch

The best way to reach me is{' '} LinkedIn

); } export default Home;
